   Kate Obenshain
   stated on July 17, 2014 in an interview on "The O'Reilly Factor":
   Compared to President Obama, "President Reagan rushed home from Santa
   Barbara vacation, from the Reagan ranch when the Korean jetliner was shot
   out of the air by the Russians."

Jon Greenberg
   By Jon Greenberg July 21, 2014

Did Reagan really rush back to DC after Korean plane shoot down in '83?

"President Reagan rushed home from Santa Barbara vacation, from the Reagan
   ranch when the Korean jetliner was shot out of the air by the Russians,"
   Obenshain said July 17 on The O’Reilly Factor.

Our ruling

   Obenshain said that when the Russians shot down a Korean passenger plane
   in 1983, Reagan rushed home from his Santa Barbara vacation.
